decision_conditions: +1 Design ext appearance OK in CA

Dvpmt in accordance with approvd plans
DES External works to match existing
+2 Ensure time limit is same as original
description: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 1st August 2023 (RN: 23/02145/FULL) for, 'External alterations to both No. 13 Hill Street and 39 Hay's Mews to alter existing windows and sills; replacement of existing windows; creation of new openings and installation of new windows; infill of existing lightwells; alteration works to existing courtyard works, associated access creation and landscaping; installation of new external light fittings; installation of a new dry riser; works at roof level including repair and upgrade works; installation of new rooflights; new means of escape and access onto Hays Mews; installation of new plant equipment and associated enclosure; other associated works'; NAMELY; to install new railings to allow routine maintenance to be carried out safely, to increase the height of parapet levels, to replace existing dormer structure with a new replacement dormer structure, to replace part of existing roof finish with new material and finish; and the substitution and deletion of approved drawings. (Application under Section 73 of the Act).
